name: Mussel
description:
Minature Underwater Strange Squid Eradication Liner

A brash underwater shooter by Jonathan Whiting, synced to a single killer chiptune track by David Whiting aka Demoscene Time Machine.

"shakes the screen so hard you think your monitor will burst" - indiegames.com

"not any kind of bivalve mollusk with a brown or purplish-black shell" - rockpapershotgun.com
